_1.Name: Warrior
_1.Usage: You have increased physical attack power and stamina.

_2.Name: Pacifist
_2.Usage: Aww, it seems like fighting just isn't your thing. Why don't you try running away instead? :P

_3.Name: Magician
_3.Usage: Right click with your wand to cast a bolt of thunder which will shock your opponents.

_4.Name: Sprinter
_4.Usage: Wow, you are really fast! But that also means that your food will go down quickly too.

_15.Name: Archer
_15.Usage: Wielding your bow, you deal twice as much damage to enemies.
